summary: Changes the clanging blacksmith hammer audio to a more distanced muffled sound.
descriptionHtml:
I found the constant clanging of the blacksmith hammer to be extremely annoying when crafting items at the forge, so I changed it to the distanced blacksmith hammer originally in the game when you are far from a forge and an npc is hammering stuff. For me it makes using the forge a lot more enjoyable.

To install just extract to your skyrim directory or use NMM.
To uninstall just delete the audio files or use NMM.

Check out the video section to hear the change. Enjoy =)

If the video doesn\'t work, here is the link: www.youtube.com/watch?v=e5fX6QVlGO4

Update:
Added an optional file that lowers all forge related sounds.

My other mods:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4729] Soultrap Sound Edit - Calm Wind [/url]
author: ZeRo2545
